Name: Cardiology
Description: Specializes in diagnosing and treating heart-related conditions.

Name: Dermatology
Description: Focuses on the treatment of skin, hair, and nail disorders.

Name: Neurology
Description: Deals with disorders of the brain and nervous system.

Name: Orthopedics
Description: Specializes in conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.

Name: Pediatrics
Description: Focuses on the medical care of infants, children, and adolescents.

Name: Radiology
Description: Uses imaging techniques to diagnose and treat diseases.

Name: Surgery
Description: Involves performing operations to treat or diagnose conditions.

Name: Urology
Description: Focuses on the urinary tract and male reproductive system.

Name: Oncology
Description: Specializes in diagnosing and treating cancer.

Name: Endocrinology
Description: Deals with hormone-related diseases and conditions.

Name: Gastroenterology
Description: Focuses on the digestive system and its disorders.

Name: Ophthalmology
Description: Specializes in eye and vision care.

Name: Pulmonology
Description: Deals with diseases involving the respiratory tract.
